section.name: Once-Only Controller
section.p: The Once Only Controller causes the controllers under it to deliver test cases only once during a test run. Thereafter, those test cases are dropped from the test. In other words, those test cases will be sampled only during the first iteration. There is no configuration required (or possible) for this controller, so it is very simple to use. One might find this controller useful to create a test plan where a login page is sampled only once, and thereafter skipped - which is typical user behavior.
